descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][FONT=Times New Roman][SIZE=7][I][B]Breezehome Nordic House[/B][/I][/SIZE][/FONT]


Hello there everyone!

Ever since I  have started playing Skyrim I found out that almost every player house  were very poor in decoration and style, and this opinion was vastly  reenforced when I saw Shawkab releasing is Hideout here on this site, is  work refreshed our day by day play in this game but , with such a great  Mod the house itself was not at the same rate and level, so I thought,  why not building a house that could leave up to Shawkab Hideout level in  style and presentation...

I started searching for the hundreds  of House Mods available, but for one reason or another I didn\'t liked  them, so with the Creation Kit release, I started playing with it and  created this Breezehome Nordic House version...


[B][I][SIZE=\"6\"][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"] Breezehome Nordic House   Content Notes[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE][/I][/B]


For starting I did not changed the house room structure,  there are no sized rooms or new created ones,
The house maintains its original interior sizes , and this cause I do not find attractive to  enter a small
house to find a huge mansion interior that haves nothing to do in size with the exterior house dimensions.

In this house Mod you can find a completely redecorated Breezehome interior, much more attractive to be at
that the original game House, a large fireplace  stone statues and columns Noble bedroom Enchanting and Alchemy
tables House carl bedroom dining area and much more...


[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Important Notes[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]

Future updates can be done since I plan on restructuring the house exterior size in order to make more rooms inside it...
This house is fully compatible with Shawkabs Dovahkin Hideout that you can find in this link here:

[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"5\"][COLOR=\"Orange\"]Shawkabs Dovahkin Hideout Mod[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]

[COLOR=Yellow][I][B]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12553[/B][/I][/COLOR]


[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Installation[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B] 

[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Orange\"]Attention[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]

It  is advisable that before you install this house Mod remove all your  stuff and house clutter and save the game after this removals so that  after the Mod install you do not find your stuff missing or clutter scattered all over the house...
It is also advisable to install this house and use it in a previous saved game that you didn\'t enter the house yet, Why this?
Cause the game stores every kind of information over your saved games and you can be lucky and the mod loads properly or just loads with objects from your last saved game that belong to the previous house... So for better results install this house and use it with a saved game that you just bought the house for example.

Just  put the   breezehome nordic house.esp  in

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Do not forget to enable the file in you skyrim launcher  under Data Files...


[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Future Updates[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]

Check out this page in my profile for the house interiors screenshots and new WIP stuff:

[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"5\"][COLOR=\"Orange\"]Steam Screenshot Page[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]

[COLOR=Yellow][B]http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198002734607/screenshots/[/B][/COLOR][B][/B]


[B][I][FONT=\"Times New Roman\"][SIZE=\"6\"][COLOR=\"Silver\"]Info....[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/I][/B]

watch the pictures to check the house alterations...
This is my first Mod and I would appreciate a lot your comments and endorsements...


Have fun          [/CENTER]
author: Bullfye
